title: 1965 Split screen Panel for sale REDUCED £28980 inc Videos

posts.content:
http://www.thecarspecialists.com/vw-tra ... ld-4085517

If you are unsure about clicking the link, just visit our website direct http://www.thecarspecialists.com
The bus is on site and looks stunning.

If your seriously interested please drop me a text/call me 07799906943 Regards Ben

This bus has mega leith a big BHP
2165cc engine 2800 miles
High torque geared starter motor
Twin 48s
MSD ignition
Pro Rancho box
Creative engineering steering rack fitted
CSP Front disc brakes just serviced
New rear brakes
New Brake lines
New fuel lines
New oil cooling lines and Oil stat
New Alternator
Straight axle conversion
CSP shifter
Dropped Spindles
New shocks all round and lowered.
Handbrake extension.
Electronic ignition with cut out switch as seen on photos.
Flat 4 Banjo steering wheel with porshe horn push.
Custom exhaust
356 rims with genuine porshe hub caps & brand new 356 spare wheel.
Brand new tyres allround Bridgestone 195x60x15 on rear & 145x65x15 on front only done 1900 miles
Show condition cab area fully re trimmed.

The engine - Rough spec

Heads
Magnum Plus heads(42 inlet 37 exhaust) fully reworked & polished, combustion chambers balanced. Dual h/duty springs, lash caps fitted to valves. 1.5 to 1 auto-craft rocker assy.

Carburetion
Dual Webber 48 IDF carburettors, match ported to bigger bodied manifolds, in turn match ported to the cylinder heads. Hexbar throttle linkage.

Engine Case & Components
New case machined for stroker crank
larger barrels & full flow oil
78 mil forged crank
8 dowled
lightened & polished
Scat I beam rods polished and end to end balanced
Lightened balanced flywheel.
Achiever style pulley straight cut timing gears
Mahle 94 mil, stoker pistons & barrels, Webcam 86b camshaft, CB performance cam followers.
The crank assembly has been fully balanced.

Exhaust System
1 3/4 stainless steel merged header, stainless steel turbo muffler.
Cooling & Tinwear
30 horsepower doghouse fan housing, dirrectional cooling flaps welded in place.
All origional VW tinwear blasted & powder coated.
New oil cooler fitted
Berg oil pump cover & external cooler and new oil stat.

Fuel
Facet red top fuel pump, pressure regulator with gauge, stainless steel braided fuel lines.

Ignition
MSD 6AL unit, MSD Blaster coil, Mallory Distributor & Petronix Electronic Ignition.

Transmission
Rancho Freeway Flyer, 2100 lb Kenedy dual friction clutch, IRSd, SCAT dragfast gear shifter

Telemetry
VDO oil temp gauge, VDO oil pressure gauge, Sun Pro Tachometer with shift light.

The van NOW drives amazing, purchased it in October 2014 from a local guy off here actually (you may recognise it), when getting the bus home it became clear that there were quite a few bits that needed to be done. I was planning a big trip to Europe this year hence the amount of work I have recently had done at the 'Type 2 Detectives' in Cambridge to do my best to increase reliability and my confidence in this stunning Bus, Paul and the team down there were fabulous and I am still unsure if I actually want to sell it as it looks and drives amazing. Real head turner, great power, insane sound....

Dare to be different...

Finance available and PX considered

Thanks for reading
PM me for more details..

£28980

Thanks

Ben

I have ran the bus everyday and had no problems since all of the work has been carried out at Type 2 Detectives... Reliable everyday runner, real head turner.. twin rear double door nice example...

£28980 OBO considered

This bus looks and drives stunning... Solid underneath, no jobs require doing. Buy with confidence.
Thanks for your text's I appreciate your comments..

If you need any further info just text or call 07799906943
Regards Ben
Recent mechanical over haul under the bus at Type 2 Detectives costing £1000's ... Superb Bus.
Its L345 , this is my old panel, its very very nice ! GLWS fella.

It's a great bus...
Thanks for your comments Cassie27

Still unsure if I actuslly any to sell it.. I was talking to a guy today called Richard who built the engine and had lots of positive stuff to say about it.. Great solid bus...
Hopefully he's going to send me some pictures to pop on here of the shell before paint..

Thanks

Ben
